name: Dealer's Dungeon
description:
A dealer has trapped Algernon in a maze.  Can you help him find the cheese?

(Note: If experiencing issues with the cursor, press the game window to shift focus back onto it.)

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Spacebar to drop a flag (you can only have 5 out at a time)

Q/E to cycle through flag colors

Tab to view map

P to pause and unpause game

Credits:

Alinda Heng - Coding, art, game concept

Max Ammendolea - Music, game concept

Allan Millar - Game concept

Jose Valdez - Game concept

Assets:

Innovana Games - Table texture
